articles.title: Today's NYT Mini Crossword Clues And Answers For Sunday, July 27th
articles.author: Erik Kain
articles.summary: IKEA, a retail chain, has an average store size of 300,000 square feet. The NYT Mini Crossword puzzle included this clue as part of its questions.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S: No More First Android Updates?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is prioritizing its Galaxy S series with key AI features, software enhancements, and redesigned UI/UX elements, debuting with the Galaxy S26 line and One UI X.5 iteration. The Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Z Flip 8 will launch with One UI 9 and Android 17, becoming proving grounds for fully refined features. This shift aims to deliver a smoother user experience for the broader Galaxy S user base.

articles.title: It's Qwen's summer: new open source Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507 tops OpenAI, Gemini reasoning models on key benchmarks
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: Alibaba's Qwen Team has launched four new open-source generative AI models. The Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507, a reasoning LLM, is designed for complex tasks involving self-reflection and checking. In the AIME25 benchmark, the model achieved a leading score of 92.3.

articles.title: 34 Essential Products You've Been Putting Off Buying
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products including Downy fabric spray, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, The Pink Stuff's "Sqeezy" sponge set, Mouthwatchers' flossing toothbrush, WellPatch migraine/headache patches, Dreo oscillating tower fan, Wet & Forget weekly cleaner, Nivea skin firming gel cream, Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows, and Bissell multipurpose portable cleaner. These products cater to various needs, from cleaning and personal care to home comfort, and are presented as solutions to everyday problems.

articles.title: Why that super-sized shampoo bottle isn't so super-sized after all: We've all long suspected that we're being hoodwinked - so are ANY actually filled to the top? SARAH RAINEY investigates...
articles.author: SARAH RAINEY
articles.summary: An experiment revealed discrepancies between stated and actual volumes in various beauty and personal care products. For instance, Garnier Vitamin C Nutri-Glow Body Cream's jar has a 150ml difference, while Simple Gentle Cleansing Shampoo's bottle can hold 60ml more. Other products tested included CeraVe Foaming Face Cleanser, Garnier Ambre Solaire Soothing After Sun, and Dove Moisturising Hand Wash.

articles.title: That time knowing basic German got me a free pretzel
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: uTalk offers a language learning platform with lifetime access to lessons in over 150 languages for a one-time purchase of $99.97. The platform focuses on everyday topics and uses native speaker audio and interactive games to facilitate learning. Users can learn from any device and start using real-world phrases right away.

articles.title: Ryzen Threadripper 9980X Launch: $4,999 Price and Release Date Announced
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: AMD has announced the Ryzen Threadripper 9980X, a new high-end processor launching on August 29th, 2025, with a price of $4,999. This processor features 64 cores/128 threads, a boost clock of up to 5.2 GHz, and 128MB of L3 cache, targeting professional workloads like content creation, scientific computing, and virtualization.

articles.title: 34 Cheap, Pretty, And Practical TikTok Products
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Several new products are available, including a milk frother for creating cafe-style lattes at home and a mini waffle maker.  Additionally, a U-shaped neckline workout set provides a comfortable and stylish option for gym-goers, and a mushroom kitchen timer adds a touch of fantasy to cooking.

articles.title: Smeg New World giveaway smart move, says marketing expert
articles.author: RNZ
articles.summary: New World supermarket is running a promotion offering Smeg baking dishes and utensil organizers in exchange for collected stickers. This promotion aims to broaden Smeg's exposure and increase its market share through a growth strategy.

articles.title: Is a 'pretty good' Alexa+ good enough to pull off a comeback almost two years after Amazon's revamped voice assistant was first announced?
articles.author: Jason Del Rey
articles.summary: Amazon is rolling out a new and improved version of its voice assistant, Alexa, called Alexa+. The service, announced in September 2023 and delayed due to technological challenges, launched with a phased rollout. Prime members receive the Alexa+ upgrade for free, while non-members will pay around $20 per month after the official launch.

articles.title: Local Announcement: ‚ú® Lobet Cleaning Services ‚Äì Spotless Results, Every Time! ‚ú®
articles.author: Morristown
articles.summary: Lobet Cleaning Services is launching residential and commercial cleaning services in New Jersey. The company offers home, apartment, office, commercial, deep cleaning, and move in/out cleaning services. Customers can choose weekly, biweekly, or one-time service options and eco-friendly products are available.

articles.title: Smeg Giveaway: Marketing Win for Brand Awareness üèÜ
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Smeg partnered with New World supermarket to offer items like cast iron braisers and baking dishes in exchange for loyalty stickers. This promotion allows consumers to acquire a piece of the Smeg brand for a fraction of the cost, introducing it to a wider audience and fostering a sense of attainable aspiration. The partnership demonstrates a shift in luxury marketing towards channel agnosticism and experiential focus.

articles.title: JAECOO J5 Is Set To Make UAE Debut With Stylish, Tech-Forward Urban SUV Inspired By ...
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: OMODA&JAECOO UAE will launch the JAECOO J5, a new SUV.

articles.title: Health warning over counterfeit vodka made with medical-grade alcohol
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Glen's vodka will have a 'very different' smell and taste compared to the regular version.

articles.title: 36 Things To Help Address Obnoxious Bodily Functions
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new beauty and personal care products designed to address specific needs. These include the Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, I Dew Care dry shampoo powder, Nivea Q10 gel cream, and Revlon Volcanic Face Roller, among others, each targeting concerns from dark circles and oily hair to skin firming and shine control. Also mentioned is Truremedy Naturals Remedy Tea Tree Oil Body Wash.

articles.title: New O3 Waterworks Ozone-Based Laundry System Is Tiny, Even More Useful
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Smart Laundry System +PLUS produces the same concentrations of ozonated water. The system fits in more places. It also provides better information.

articles.title: From Warehouse to Bathroom: Why Concentrates Are a Logistics Dream
articles.author: Mick Rutasinovski
articles.summary: Ecofam introduces a new concentrated mouthwash that uses plant oils and extracts instead of mostly water, packaged in small glass vials. This allows users to dilute the concentrate at home in reusable bottles and reduces warehouse and shelf space needed, making it more sustainable and efficient during production and distribution.

articles.title: Labubu not the first toy craze, and certainly won't be the last
articles.author: Michelle Chapman
articles.summary: Ty launched Beanie Babies' Fortune the Panda in 1997.

articles.title: New O3 Waterworks Ozone-Based Laundry System Is Tiny, Even More Useful
articles.author: Anthony Karcz
articles.summary: O3 Waterworks has announced the Smart Laundry System +PLUS, a new model of their aqueous ozone laundry system. The new system is smaller than the original with compact, briefcase-sized block with a carbon fiber and chrome trim finish. The Smart Laundry System +PLUS is available for pre-order at $100 off the $499 MSRP.

articles.title: HDB launches pilot phase of new digital platform for booking NUCA projects
articles.author: Daily News Egypt
articles.summary: The Housing and Development Bank (HDB) has launched the pilot phase of a new digital platform. This platform facilitates the booking of housing projects and land offered by the New Urban Communities Authority (NUCA).

articles.title: HOME DEPOT PRODUCT OF THE WEEK 7-26-25
articles.author: Lonnie Hines Iii
articles.summary: Home Depot features a "Product of the week" which is a mini-excavator rental.

articles.title: ËøôÁßçÁ§ºÂìÅÊòØÈÄÅÂçï‰∏™ÁöÑËøòÊòØ‰∏ÄÂ•óÁöÑÔºü‰∏ÄÂ•óÂ•ΩÂá†ÁôæÔºöÔºâ
articles.summary: Pop Now offers a service where users can potentially obtain rare or 'hidden' items through purchase. Users also engage in buying and trading on secondary markets to acquire specific desired items, such as certain colors, suggesting a level of demand and engagement with the service's offerings.

articles.title: Review: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldable is almost too much fun
articles.author: Adam Doud
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip 7 featuring a significantly larger 4.1-inch cover screen, which is the largest external display on a flip-style phone to date. The phone is powered by an Exynos processor and addresses some frustrations regarding app appearance on the cover screen.

articles.title: 33 Cheerful Products That Are Close To Buying Happiness
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nyx introduced Smushy Matte Lip Balm made with mochi rice powder. Eos launched a limited edition Marshmallow 'Super Balm' lip treatment. Dr. Teal's released a limited edition Hawaiian Bliss Epsom salt magnesium soak with red sea salt, papaya, and hibiscus.

articles.title: This Week's Awesome Tech Stories From Around the Web (Through July 26)
articles.author: Singularityhub Staff
articles.summary: Google is launching a new feature for AI Mode in Search that will generate images of outfits and decor ideas based on user descriptions, aiding users in finding visually similar products.  A new tool is also launching to allow people to virtually try on clothes.

articles.title: Why Does This Laptop's Screen Extend When You Wave Your Hand at It?
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Lenovo is introducing the ThinkBook Plus Gen 6 Rollable, a laptop featuring a screen that automatically expands from 14" to 16.7". The product is positioned as a replacement for a second display for users with heavy workflows.

articles.title: HDB launches pilot phase of new digital platform for booking NUCA projects
articles.summary: The Housing and Development Bank (HDB) has launched a pilot phase of its new digital platform. This platform is designed to facilitate the booking of housing projects and land offered by the New Urban Communities Authority (NUCA). This initiative aligns with HDB's strategic plan to modernise housing services.

articles.title: I wish all furniture was as simple to build and nice to look at as the Thuma Classic Bed
articles.author: Chelsea Stone
articles.summary: Thuma launched the Thuma Classic Bed and Headboard, available in multiple sizes and finishes, and headboard configurations.  It features Japanese joinery for easy assembly without tools and is constructed from upcycled rubberwood. Customization options include under-bed drawers, side tables, and various headboard styles and materials.

articles.title: Foldable, not forgettable
articles.summary: Vivo introduced the Vivo X Fold 5, a durable foldable phone. The new foldable phone skipped 'Fold 4' and aims to be more robust.

articles.title: 42 Products That Will Make You Feel Like You Just Switched Your Life Into 'Easy Mode'
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces an assortment of novel products designed to enhance convenience and efficiency in various aspects of daily life, from cleaning and cooking to beauty routines. These include items such as a ChomChom pet hair remover roller, a Beachwaver B1 Rotating Curling Iron, and FryAway cooking oil solidifier, aimed at simplifying tasks and improving overall experiences for users.

articles.title: üí•DARKVPS - PROMO - 10% Recurring Discount Bare Metal RDP - 8vCPU-128vCPU - Only for WHTüí•
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: A company offers affordable and reliable dedicated servers/bare metal RDP services. These are physical servers, not trial versions from cloud providers, and are exclusively set up for individual users.

articles.title: Xiaomi Launches New Smart Robot Vacuums in Singapore with Hands-Free, Deep-Cleaning Power
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched two new smart cleaning devices in Singapore: the Xiaomi Robot Vacuum H40 and S40. The H40 features a 4L disposable dust bag and LDS laser navigation. The S40 has 10,000Pa suction power and a 5200mAh battery, both integrating with the Xiaomi Home app for control and monitoring.

articles.title: Redmagic offers fans ‚Ç¨50 off high-end gaming smartphone in flash summer sale
articles.summary: Redmagic has launched its summer sale, offering discounts on the Redmagic 10 Pro gaming smartphone. Customers can save ‚Ç¨50 on all variants of the phone. There are also discounts on accessories such as the clip-on Redmagic VC Cooler 6.

articles.title: Amazon launches new Kindle Colorsoft models, including first color Kindle for kids
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the new 16 GB Kindle Colorsoft for $249.99 and the first-ever Kindle Colorsoft Kids edition for $269.99. These devices feature color displays and aim to enhance the reading experience with features like color-coded highlighting, adjustable warm light and access to Amazon's eBook store. The Kindle Colorsoft Kids includes Amazon Kids+ for a year and parental control features.

articles.title: 'I tried This Morning cleaning expert's new gadget and the results were amazing'
articles.author: Rachel Sloper
articles.summary: Lynsey Crombie, in collaboration with Swan, has launched a new cleaning product range, featuring the Swan x Lynsey window vacuum. This device is designed for cleaning windows, tiles, and shower screens, offering streak-free finishes and easy maintenance. The product is available on Amazon and Debenhams for ¬£39.99.

articles.title: The Rise of Concentrates: Streamlining Supply Chains
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: The consumer goods industry is experiencing a shift towards concentrated formulas, exemplified by products like concentrated mouthwash. This trend reduces water usage in products like mouthwash, leading to lower logistics costs and decreased carbon emissions. Companies are adopting this approach to meet growing consumer demand for sustainable and convenient products.

articles.title: 30 "Most Wished For" Beauty Products Worth The Hype
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several companies including Clinique, Gold Bond, Nivea, Sol De Janeiro, Mise En Sc√©ne, Beauty By Earth, D'alba Piedmont, Mielle, Kahi, ColorWow, Clean Skin Club, Medicube, Blue Lizard, OPI, Skala, Catrice, Beauty of Joseon, Grace & Stella, Bio-Collagen, Anua, Laneige, Cosrx, and Paula's Choice have beauty and personal care products available on Amazon's 'Most Wished For' section. These products include items such as lip balms, creams, oils, serums, masks, sunscreens, and hair treatments with features like moisturizing, anti-aging, and skin-brightening properties.

articles.title: 6720mAh battery, turbo charging: Motorola to launch Moto G86 Power on July 30
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G86 Power 5G, a new budget smartphone in India, scheduled for unveiling on July 30. The phone features a 6720mAh battery, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, 6.7-inch AMOLED screen, and a dual-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and 8MP ultra-wide lens. It will be available in Cosmic Sky, Golden Cypress, and Spellbound colors.

articles.title: ‚ÄòRevenge dress for a party in Sicily': This platform is using AI to make online ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Joy, a tech startup, introduced a platform leveraging AI to streamline group clothing orders. The platform addresses challenges in finding the right style, color, size, and price point for events like weddings, simplifying the online shopping experience for groups.

articles.title: Lava Unveils Blaze Dragon Budget Smartphone With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2, Android 15
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Blaze Dragon, an entry-level 5G smartphone powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and running Android 15. The phone features a 6.74-inch HD+ LCD screen, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 50MP dual rear camera, and a 5,000 mAh battery, priced at Rs 9,999 and available from August 1st. Lava will also introduce the Blaze AMOLED 2 later this month.

articles.title: Canva skills are what people hiring graphic designers increasingly want to see
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Canva's usage is growing among both general users and professionals. Job listings requiring Canva proficiency have increased significantly, with an 72% year over year. This growth indicates Canva's increasing influence in the design landscape.

articles.title: HONOR X6c, HONOR X7c launched in Pakistan
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X6c, a mid-range smartphone with AI features, a 5300mAh battery, and a 50MP Dual Camera, available starting July 26th, 2025. Alongside it, HONOR also launched the HONOR X7c, which offers a bigger screen with solid performance.

articles.title: Google Taps Into AI-Driven ‚ÄòVibe-Coding' With New App Builder Opal
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Google has launched Opal, a new AI-driven tool being tested under Google Labs, that enables users to create mini web apps by simply typing a description. The tool features an intuitive interface, a visual editor, and social collaborative design, allowing users to publish and share their creations. It aims to make app development more accessible to both technical and non-technical users.

articles.title: ‚ÄòRevenge dress for a party in Sicily': This platform is using AI to make online shopping hyper-personal
articles.author: Clare Duffy
articles.summary: Daydream, a tech startup, launched a new AI-powered online shopping platform designed to help users find products by describing them in natural language or uploading inspiration photos. The platform uses AI to provide recommendations from over 8,000 brand partners and refines searches through chatbot-like interactions, directing shoppers to brand websites to complete purchases.

articles.title: 42 Beauty Products So Good You'll Think It's Witchcraft
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new beauty and skincare products have been launched. Laneige introduced the Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption and pore blurring. L'Oreal Paris launched the Collagen Moisture Filler Moisture Bounce Face Serum for mega-hydration and the Plump Ambition pH Lip Oil for moisturizing and fuller lips.  E.l.f. released the Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara for extending lashes and Sheer For It Blush Tint, while Maybelline launched the Lifter Glaze Oil Balm for moisturizing shine and fuller lips. These products cater to various beauty and skincare needs, from hydration to coverage and enhancement.

articles.title: ‚ÄòRevenge dress for a party in Sicily': This platform is using AI to make online shopping hyper-personal
articles.author: Clare Duffy
articles.summary: Daydream, a tech startup, launched its AI-powered shopping platform that allows users to search for products online using natural language or inspiration photos. The platform connects users with over 8,000 brand partners and takes a 20% cut of sales, directing shoppers to the brand's website to complete their purchase. Daydream plans to release an app this fall.

articles.title: The new Galaxy Z series has arrived ‚Äì The One branch premieres the new generation of foldable phones
articles.summary: Samsung, in collaboration with One, has launched the new Galaxy Z series foldable phones (Z Fold7, Z Flip7, and Z Flip7 FE) and new smartwatch models Galaxy Watch8, Watch8 Classic and Watch Ultra 2025 in Montenegro. The new phones feature advanced AI and enhanced design. The devices are available in all One branches across Montenegro and via 1.me.

articles.title: Smeg New World giveaway smart move, says marketing expert
articles.author: Susan Edmunds
articles.summary: New World supermarket is offering Smeg baking dishes and utensil organizers through a promotional sticker collection program. This promotion aims to increase Smeg's brand awareness and expose its products to a broader target market in New Zealand.

articles.title: Cimex launches BYD Sealion 7 electric SUV in Nepal at introductory price
articles.author: The Himalayan Times
articles.summary: Cimex Inc. has launched the BYD Sealion 7, a premium electric SUV, in Nepal. The Sealion 7 features a 440 km range, a 100 kW motor, and a 71.8 kWh Blade Battery, with pricing starting at Rs. 72.99 lakhs for early buyers who will also receive extended warranties.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7 and Galaxy Watch8 series globally with AI-powered features
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7, and Galaxy Watch8 series globally. The Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 are thinner foldables with AI integration, enhanced cameras, and flexible displays. The Galaxy Watch8 series features an ultra-thin design and enhanced health tracking, including an Antioxidant Index.

articles.title: Google joins viral vibe-coding craze with new AI app builder Opal, here is how it works
articles.summary: Google introduced Opal, an AI-powered tool currently being tested in the US, that allows users to create mini web apps using text prompts. Opal provides a visual workflow of inputs, outputs, and generation steps, enabling users to edit prompts and share created apps online. Google aims to democratize app development by making it accessible to individuals with limited technical expertise.

articles.title: Are the new designer deodorants really worth it?
articles.author: ALICE ROBERTSON
articles.summary: Sure launched Whole Body Deo in cream, stick, and spray form with a Fresh Citrus scent. Mitchum released Women Ultimate 72H Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant, promising clinically proven protection for three days. Rollr introduced an 'anti-odorant' with a probiotic-prebiotic formula and refillable rollerball.

articles.title: AI Is Taking Over Google Search, Here's How You Can Escape
articles.summary: Google has launched new AI-powered features, AI Overviews and AI Mode, within its Google Search platform to provide AI-generated summaries and conversational search experiences. These features aim to enhance search by delivering immediate answers and interactive exploration of related topics. However, users have the option to revert to the classic search interface, although Google is subtly pushing users towards AI-driven results.

articles.title: First look: toxin-free paint brand Atelier Ellis opens London showroom ‚Äî and the rest of ...
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: A niche brand is leading a natural paint revolution. This implies the promotion of a specific paint product or service, possibly including new formulations or applications.

articles.title: Amazon debuts affordable Kindle Colorsoft and first-ever Kids Edition
articles.author: Monitor News Desk
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft lineup, featuring a colour display, warm lighting, and long battery life. The lineup includes the Kindle Colorsoft, Kindle Colorsoft Signature, and a Kids Edition, each offering unique features and pricing. The Kids Edition includes a year of Amazon Kids+ and a protective case.

articles.title: Top Web Development Companies for Your Business Needs in the UAE
articles.summary: EazzTree introduces its web development services aimed at modern businesses in the UAE. These services encompass AI & Machine Learning, Cloud & Cyber Security, Web Development, Mobile App Development, UI/UX Design, and Digital Marketing. EazzTree helps businesses grow with reliable digital solutions.

articles.title: Unlocking business growth and efficiency: How Bangladesh can leverage Generative AI
articles.author: Mohammad Sajjad Hasib
articles.summary: The article highlights the potential of Generative AI (GenAI) to improve business efficiency and customer service across industries. It cites examples such as Grameenphone using AI algorithms in its sales app and DNB automating customer service with a "chat-first" approach. The article also mentions real-world use applications in Bangladesh in call centers, tourism, software, education, healthcare, RMG (Ready-Made Garments) and agriculture industries.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad Lite Packs a 90Hz Display and 9,340 mAh Battery for Under $200
articles.author: Afaq Wajdan Malik
articles.summary: OnePlus has introduced the Pad Lite, a budget tablet featuring an 11-inch IPS LCD screen, MediaTek Helio G100 processor, and Android 15 with OxygenOS 15.0.1. The tablet includes a 9,340 mAh battery with 33W fast charging, and is priced at approximately $190 for the Wi-Fi model and $215 for the LTE variant.

articles.title: Samsung's New Phone Sparks Global Buzz
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is generating excitement with its upcoming Galaxy Z Phone X, featuring advancements in foldable display technology and AI integration. Leaks suggest a more durable foldable screen, enhanced AI capabilities for real-time language translation and advanced photo/video editing, a new camera system, and a next-gen processor. Pre-orders are expected to begin in early August, with shipments commencing later that month in key markets like the United States, South Korea, China, and major European countries.

articles.title: US appliances maker expands to Nigerias smart home market
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Admiral, an American consumer electronics and home appliances brand, has launched in Nigeria. The company is offering affordable, energy-efficient products designed for Nigerian households.

articles.title: transcosmos develops "trans-AI Analytics" in South Korea, VoC insight solution powered by generative AI
articles.author: transcosmos inc.
articles.summary: Trans-AI Analytics introduces a service featuring real-time analysis and customer support alerts to help clients address issues immediately. The solution encompasses customer emotion analysis, service/product analysis, automated issue detection, and contact center trend analysis. It also offers a CSAT report generation service to pinpoint areas for service enhancement.

articles.title: New startup Sendar unveiled
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Sendar, a new startup, has officially launched in Nigeria, offering a solution to the problem of unreliable SMS message delivery for businesses.

articles.title: The video Ai is attacking YouTube shorts and Google photos today
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered video creation features for YouTube Shorts and Google Photos, allowing users to generate videos from text prompts and photos. These features are currently powered by Google's Veo 2 model with a transition to Veo 3 planned for improved video quality and are initially available in select countries before expanding globally.

articles.title: The Chinese Coffee Chain That's Muscling In on Starbucks's Turf
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: Luckin has launched its first stores in New York, highlighting its mobile app and competitive pricing strategy. This launch marks Luckin's entry into the New York market, directly competing with established players like Starbucks.

articles.title: AMD Unveils New Processors: Prices Begin at PLN 6,669
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: AMD has launched a new line of processors, including the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 7 7800X3D, Ryzen 5 7600X, and Ryzen 5 5600G, with prices starting at PLN 6,669. These processors feature technologies like 3D V-Cache and Zen 4 architecture, delivering significant performance improvements in gaming, content creation, and productivity, while the AMD Software: Adrenalin Edition 25.4.1 is available as an optional update, offering performance optimizations and bug fixes.

articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: AudioNova is seeking individuals to test their new, potentially revolutionary Hearing Aid.

articles.title: Dyson's Iconic V8 Cordless Vacuum That's a 'Game Changer' for Cleaning Is $150 Off at Walmart Right Now
articles.author: Jeff Turbett
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is currently on sale at Walmart for $320, a 32% discount. This lightweight vacuum features powerful suction, a 40-minute battery life, and comes with nine attachments including a mini soft dusting brush and crevice tool.

articles.title: 32 Beach Vacation Essentials You Shouldn't Forget
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of newly introduced products and services for beachgoers. These include Brumate Era water bottle, Burt's Bees After Sun Soother lotion, Baby Bum SPF 50 Sunscreen, Supergoop Glowscreen, and Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Additionally, it mentions SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, a sweat-controlling whole body deodorant, and Gold Bond Friction Defense Stick as new options for personal care at the beach.

articles.title: FYI, Amazon Has A 'Most Wished For' Section ‚Äî And These 42 Items Just Make Sense For Summer
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly launched and popular products, including Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder for matte skin, Dash My Mug Ice Cream Maker for single-serving frozen desserts, Mise En Scene hair serum for frizzy hair, and Owala Freesip water bottle with a built-in straw.  E.l.f. also features with Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen and Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm and Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil.  Other products include Thermacell mosquito repeller and Jergens Natural Glow self-tanner.

articles.title: Rumor: Marvel Rivals Could Be Teasing New Skin for The Thing
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Marvel Rivals potentially revealed a new symbiote skin for the Vanguard The Thing.

articles.title: Steam Testing Big Change to Store Menu
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Steam released a beta client build. The build allows users to test a redesigned store menu. The build also allows testing of improved search functions.

articles.title: 33 Adorable Products That Are Surprisingly Useful
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Simple Modern introduced a tumbler designed to encourage increased water consumption, featuring a design that fits in cup holders and keeps water cold. Hugaround launched a weighted plush doll designed to offer stress relief through its huggable design and temperature adaptability.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Watch8 series globally
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. announced the global availability of Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, its latest foldable smartphones, alongside the new Galaxy Watch8 series. Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 are the company's thinnest, lightest, and most advanced Z series devices, enhanced with AI, while the Galaxy Watch8 series brings new health tracking features to the wrist. The new products are available for purchase at Samsung.com and in stores across 49 markets starting July 25.

articles.title: Just 27 Little Treats Since Mercury Is Retrograding
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several new products. L'Oreal launches a natural glow enhancer infused with glycerin and shea butter for an illuminating tint and a sun-kissed glow. Additionally, a pack of three beer-infused hot sauces crafted with real craft beer is introduced to spice up meals.

articles.title: Pop-Tarts drop new flavored ice cream sandwiches, pints
articles.author: Megan Swift
articles.summary: Kellanova launched Pop-Tarts ice cream sandwiches and pints in three flavors: Frosted Strawberry, Frosted Brown Sugar Cinnamon, and Frosted Chocolate Fudge. These are available at Walmart. In addition, Pop-Tarts released a limited-edition branded pool floatie, available at Target.

articles.title: Feature: Chinese startup brings cutting-edge AI glasses to the masses
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Rokid recently launched its new-generation Rokid Glasses, AI-powered smart glasses weighing 49 grams with a robust battery life. Priced around 3,000 yuan, the glasses offer features like real-time captions, translations, navigation prompts, and AI-generated answers, positioning them as a potential everyday device accessible to a broader market.

articles.title: Chinese startup brings cutting-edge AI glasses to the masses
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Rokid has introduced Rokid Glasses, lightweight smart glasses with AI capabilities, priced at around 3,000 yuan. These glasses offer features such as real-time captions, translations, and navigation, and have already sold over 300,000 units.

articles.title: Lipstick Day: 5 Indian lipsticks that suit every brown skin tone
articles.author: Srushti Kulkarni
articles.summary: Dream Beauty launched Intuition Creamy Matte Lipstick with Shea Butter, Vitamin E, and Jojoba Oil, available in six shades. Typsy Beauty introduced Cocoa Peptide Velvet Matte Lipstick featuring Cocoa Peptide and Suede Touch Technology in three chocolate-scented shades. Lov Etc launched Pout, Perfect, Etc High-Definition Matte Lipstick, enriched with Marula Oil, Avocado Oil, and Hyaluronic Acid, available in 12 shades.

articles.title: Congress should protect personalized ads for business
articles.summary: Meta's AI-powered advertising tools enable businesses to analyze user behavior, fine-tune creative content, and deliver targeted ads. These tools have demonstrated the ability to generate high-quality leads at lower costs and improve conversion performance, allowing businesses to scale results previously unattainable.
